name: <<collections::vec_deque::drain::Drain<'_, T, A> as core::ops::Drop>::drop::DropGuard<'r, 'a, T, A> as core::ops::Drop>::drop::join_head_and_tail_wrapping

collections::vec_deque::VecDeque::<T, A>.doc:
Copies a potentially wrapping block of memory len long from src to dest.
 (abs(dst - src) + len) must be no larger than capacity() (There must be at
 most one continuous overlapping region between src and dest).

path.path: alloc::<<collections::vec_deque::drain::Drain<'_, T, A> as core::ops::Drop>::drop::DropGuard<'r, 'a, T, A> as core::ops::Drop>::drop::join_head_and_tail_wrapping
